text: Pseudotritonia quadrangularis is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a shell-less marine gastropod mollusk in the family Charcotiidae. == Distribution == Pseudotritionia quadrangularis are found in Antarctic waters, the Antarctic peninsula, and other nearby islands. == References == Category:Fauna of Antarctica Category:Charcotiidae Category:Gastropods described in 1912
title: Pseudotritonia quadrangularis
